summary: Romantic multi-page website with animated hearts/stars, a landing page question, and two choice buttons leading to two themed pages (message page and illustration page).
architectural_notes: Implement as a small static site with 3 pages (landing + 2 destinations) and CSS-based animations for floating hearts/stars and star twinkle effects.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Seamless heart pattern background (hearts-bg-tile.dim_512x512.png)
- Kiss stamp graphic (kiss-stamp.dim_256x256.png)
- Illustration of two girls jumping with a heart between them (two-girls-jumping-heart.dim_1200x900.png)
- Small star sprite for twinkling (star-sprite.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a landing page that displays the prompt text â€œbe with me forever tarunağŸ«´ğŸ¼ğŸŒ·?â€ in a lovely cursive-style font, with a heart-filled background and floating hearts and stars animation. Place two clearly visible buttons underneath labeled â€œyassâ€ and â€œdefinitelyâ€.

Add client-side routing/navigation so clicking â€œyassâ€ opens a separate page/route for the â€œyassâ€ content and clicking â€œdefinitelyâ€ opens a separate page/route for the â€œdefinitelyâ€ content.

Create the â€œyassâ€ destination page with a very light pastel pink background, display the provided multi-line message text exactly as written, styled in a baby-pink bubble-style font, and include a small kiss-stamp graphic positioned on an edge of the page.

Create the â€œdefinitelyâ€ destination page with a white background, render an illustration of two girls jumping with a heart between them (one with brown skin and curly hair; one with pale skin and wavy/straight hair), add the caption text â€œtogether forever- taru and sharaâ€ in a cherry-pink bubbly font with a heart near it, and animate stars that float and twinkle around the page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build landing page with cursive prompt text, hearts-filled background, floating hearts/stars animation, and two buttons: "yass" and "definitely".
Create "yass" destination page with specified compliment text in baby-pink bubble font, very light pastel pink background, and a kiss stamp graphic on the edge.
Create "definitely" destination page with white background, twinkling/floating stars, cherry-pink bubbly caption text, and an illustration of two girls jumping with a heart between them.
Add navigation/routing so clicking each option button loads the correct separate page.

projectName: Romantic multi-page website with animated hearts/stars and two choice pages
